features: Size reference: our DGDFLDGC mini craft iron comes measuring approx 108 x 63 x 66 mm/ 4.25 x 2.48 x 2.6 inches, proper size and convenient for you to use to carry with and ironing needs at any time. tiny iron is more suitable for your DIY manual needs and meets your small projects.

Exquisite and reasonable design: This DGDFLDGC portable iron Features Quick-Heat Technology that Heats it in Just 15 Seconds–Features 3 Heat Power Levels, can be used on ironing Baby clothes, towels, ties, etc. The front of the handheld iron heating plate is designed in a triangular shape, which flexible ironing of narrow areas such as buttons, plackets, even collars, allowing the details to be displayed elegantly.

Pretty and easy to store: Bright colors look beautiful, giving you a nice visual experience. The travel iron mini machine is easily used without tiring your hands, Lightweight small easily carried in the suitcase. mini easy press is small but can meet the user's requirements as an electric iron.

Small but powerful: our DGDFLDGC small craft iron is ideal for people who love crafting and DIY and makes the sewing process easier, suitable for a variety of fabric materials including wool, polyester, silk, nylon, and linen. You can also use mini press patch iron, heat transfer vinyl, diamonds, etc., the practical tool helps you achieve such a purpose easily.

Practical for: The portable iron makes life more refined and fashionable, suitable for home and travel use. Our heat press mini fits for craft enthusiasts and housewives, you can also take it as a delicate gift to friends. Hope you have a happy-easy-to-use experience. we offer premium quality and the best service to you.
body.description: Fall in love with your clothes again with hand held ironer mini. Different from large clothes iron, our portable iron mini can take you to complete more exquisite crafts and make your home life more colorful. Why Choose mini press For Clothes? * Fast instant heat. Maintains constant desired temperature when ironing. * 400w low power consumption. * Adjustable temperature controlhighest temperature reaching 220. * Teflon sole plate. * Lightweight Compact Design: portable hand iron , great for home/travel use. Specifications： Power: 110V, 60Hz Wattage: 400W Size: 6.6''*2.7''*3.8'' SPECIAL ATTENTION: *Turn off the iron then place it upright on the table if you need to stop ironing. *Never use heat press on clothes that you are wearing on yourself. *For perfect use, please use a hanger to hang your clothes while steaming. *Do not iron leather and other materials (fabrics) that are not suitable for electric ironing to avoid damage! There is no absolute ironing position for the above fabrics, but it can also be adjusted according to your actual situation. In order to avoid ironing your clothes, please use an ironing pad as far as possible, or use a padded cloth or a thin towel on the clothes to iron again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great Iron for the crafter. Light weight and easy to use and store

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect price for the perfect product
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for waxing our skis and snowboards. Worked perfect! I did scratch the metal coating on the sharp ski edges, but that doesn’t matter and won’t affect the effectiveness. Will also use it for applying MonoKote to my RC Airplanes, and I’m sure the wife will use it in her craft room for all sorts of stuff. A similar product at my local ski shop is $69! This for under $20 does the same job just a good! Very happy with it. Oh, and cleanup was easy too, just wiped excess wax off with a shop towel after unplugging while it was still hot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This iron is lightweight and easy to use. I only gave it 4 stars because the cord doesn't swivel and is always in the way. If it came out of the back instead of the side that would solve the problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very small works well for travel

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s tiny but it’s impressive
reviews.reviewText: It’s so cute! Tiny enough to pack in my overnight bag or backpack, heats quickly and easy to use. I’m truly excited because it’s a simple iron but as small as it is, it does a great job. I’m very glad I got it and highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewText: Cute, but don't waste your money. This doesn't get hot enough to knock the wrinkles out of a cotton t-shirt and the cord is waaaay too short.
